page.title: 10LOCAL HISTORY LCING 1945 CON
page.content: The main shopping centre was south of the railway line.The Library wasn't there then because it was a recreation ground.Grinstead Lane didn't have a bridge then so the main link road from north to south was south street.Kings Road then used to be called farmers lane.Lancing used to be a holiday resort.Brooklands Boating lake used to be a rubbish tip.French planes used to blow up the doodlebugs landed where what now is Whitestyles.The coast road didn't have very many houses along it. Writen by Jason Sparrow,Antonio Aguilera,Clinton Tanner and Graham Bull. From Irene Avenue C.Middle school Lancing West Sussex.
